snippet: ConAgra Foods is spinning off its frozen potatoes business and unloading a second major division as it works to focus on its prominent, name-brand foods.
abstract: ConAgra Foods is spinning off its frozen potatoes business and unloading second major unit as it focuses on name-brand foods.
lead_paragraph: ConAgra Foods is spinning off its frozen potatoes business and unloading a second major division as it works to focus on its prominent, name-brand foods.

headline.print_headline: Conagra to Spin Off Divisions to Focus on Prominent Brands
headline.main: ConAgra to Spin Off Divisions to Focus on Prominent Brands
